meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> that gives <radical>life</radical> is our very own <kanji>star</kanji> (which we happen to call the sun). Of course, all the other stars are probably giving life to other planets as well.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>star</kanji> (the sun) and all of the others are yours to protect with your trusty <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい). If you could protect your land from the West, then you can certainly defend the stars too!
